bug.author: lgeiger
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13285808/86589566-2da0de00-bf8e-11ea-9cad-9cd377fc503a.png></denchmark-link>
The service tab in the Sidebar say serivce instead of service. <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Start a service and look at the sidebar <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
serivce -> service <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
Polyaxon CE v1.1 Unfortunately I couldn't find the UI code so I am not able to directly submit a PR.
